import React from 'react'; import {httpService} from '../../service/HttpService'; import {config} from '../../config/Config'; import { Loading } from '../layout/Loading'; class Warga extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { wargas:[], }; } componentWillMount() { Loading.SpinnerRun(true); httpService.Get(config.routeApi.wargas,null).then(response=>{ this.setState({ wargas:response }, function() { Loading.SpinnerRun(false); }); }); } render(){ return
